response.name: Hourly Demand, Demand Forecast, Generation, and Interchange
response.description:
Hourly demand, day-ahead demand forecast, net generation, and interchange by balancing authority.  
    Source: Form EIA-930
    Product: Hourly Electric Grid Monitor

frequency.description: One data point for each hour in UTC time.
One data point for each hour in local time.

value.alias: Demand, Demand Forecast, Net Generation, or Interchange
